commands.name: call <name>
commands.description: This command allows user call someone

commands.name: set brightness to <number from 0 to 255>
commands.description: This command allows user to set brightness of the screen

commands.name: open <name>
commands.description: This command allows user open other apps

commands.name: mute
commands.description: This command allows user to turn off everything that makes device 'alive'

commands.name: turn off the screen
commands.description: This command allows user to turn off the screen
